description.p: Displays the Tabbed UI Buttons pane.
Default = *[js:true]*. If *[js:true]*, TabbedUI menu panel is animated into view. If *[js:false]*, no animation is used.

discussion.p: The *[js:tbiObj.showTabbedUIMenuPanel()]* method displays the Buttons pane. This method is typically used with Integrated Login to display the buttons pane in the [afterLogin] event when the user has successfully logged in.
